name: Hex (itch) (Zeppelin Games)
description:
Hex is a easy to use map maker using hex tiles. This piece of software could be used to create custom DnD maps, RPG maps or just for relaxation. There are 3 different categories of tiles to choose from, base, buildings and nature. Each of these categories has from 5-25 different tiles to choose from.

Controls:
Left mouse - Draw new tiles
Right mouse - Erase tiles
Middle mouse - Move camera
Scrollwheel - Zoom camera
